uvi.description:
efi: Change down_interruptible() in virt_efi_reset_system() to down_trylock()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.75 by commit 3b42751401424a1c0f39297b7f4317598aa33474. For more details please see the references link.
